name: fold-context
desc: Performs a looped call over some inputs and some context rows specified by folding a column as start column index and width in operand arguments as length of items in rows

operand.name: width
operand.desc: number of columns to loop over

operand.name: fold-column
operand.desc: column to base the loop on

operand.name: source-index
operand.desc: index of the source to run
